channel.title: Lumbridge Castle Stairs?
channel.description:
Does anyone knows how to make the stairs on Lumbridge Castle work on every floor?
If so, please help me ... :)

item.title: Lumbridge Castle Stairs?
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

[quote=“madgamer, post:4, topic:223996”][quote author=(Anthony) link=topic=294247.msg2366399#msg2366399 date=1217977100]

just get the case number for the object, and say

heightLevel = x;

depending on what floor you’re going to.

Stupid, it probably isn’t added.
[/quote]

if you’re too stupid to get what i’m saying then why post?[/quote]
Here are the reasons I know you have no clue what your doing,

  1. You are talking like the object is already initiated in the objectClick method (Or w/e it’s called in wL)
  2. You called me stupid.
  3. Just cause.

I get what your saying, you just have no clue what your talking about,
It’s not a case number, it’s the objects id.
A “case” is a part of a switch statement, a switch statement can act as multiple if statements,
instead of

if (monkey = 3) {
sendMessage("lalala");
}
if (monkey = 2) {
sendMessage("lalala");
}

it could look like,

switch (monkey) {
case 3:
sendMessage("lalala");
break;
case 2:
sendMessage("lalala");
break;

Read full topic
